titleStmt.title: A profession of faith comprizing the ancient forms of the Catholick Church with other articles relating to the terms of communion with the present church of Rome / by E.S., an English Catholick.
titleStmt.author: E. S., English Catholick.
Stephens, Edward, d. 1706.

notesStmt.note: Ascribed by Wing to Edward Stephens (Socrates Christianus), an anti-Catholic writer.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
